snippet: Recently, Sylvie Barbier, dressed in a bright emerald colored jacket, credited Santo Spirito in Florence as the place where she began expressing herself through her fashion choices.
abstract: Sylvie Barbier, spotted in Santo Spirito neighborhood of Florence, Italy, says that as fashion teacher she aims to wear clothes that will inspire her students.
lead_paragraph: Recently, Sylvie Barbier, dressed in a bright emerald colored jacket, credited Santo Spirito in Florence as the place where she began expressing herself through her fashion choices.
